casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF: B.M. No. 56P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2018 Joshua Howell, Attorney at Law, for Rutherford County DSS. Lee F. Taylor, Attorney at Law, Marion, for B.M. Brian Oglesby, Attorney at Law, Rutherfordton, for Bridges, Dexter. David L. Coldren, for Coldren, David. Michelle P. Coldren, for Coldren, Michelle.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Respondents (David & Michelle Coldren) on the 23rd of February 2018 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th of March 2018 by Respondent (David & Michelle Coldren) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."
